channel.title: McKelvie, Jamie on Chege's Blog

item.title: The Wicked + The Divine
item.description: Volume 9 was nominated for the 2020 Hugo Award for Best Graphic Story or Comic. However, not very stoked after Book One (Vol 1 and 2). Maybe it gets better? Only Volume 9 has been nominated for a Hugo Award, so maybe check that next time before committing? The Wicked + The Divine. Image credits: wicdiv.com ​​The Recurrence. Every 90 years, 12 gods reincarnate on earth for 2 years.
